rules_text: Whenever Ancient Durumderm attacks, you may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, create a Treasure token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“Life is old here, older than the trees.”
—Mia Reyes, Xenobiologist[/i]
notes: Take Me Home, Country Roads — John Denver
